issue.title: [Feature]: Mid-run population injections and other tools
issue.body:
### Feature Request

Using pysr i wanted to automate some task  however it requires injection of new population (i get the current population apply some custom fns to it and inject back)       I also require training  Data to be changed midway       etc

All this is required because my training data has values with each value being {value:Num, err:SomeNum}          because its a physical measurment it has err the + - error rate      idk and i dont thing pysr lets you say hey heres my data just remember its valid of N = n +- a      so  like it trys to use different values of possible N of each data item   such that the equation stays clean  across all other data points

nodes.body: The new "guesses" feature should allow this in #999
